column1: #Text=Raiko says : " Thank you both for coming . "
#Text=Varrick says : " It 's nice to be welcomed back with open arms . "
#Text=Raiko says : " Actually , I brought you here out of necessity .
#Text=Like when you took over my company and bombed the Southern Water Tribe Cultural Center !
#Text=" Varrick says : " I own that building !
#Text=A man has a right to blow up his own property !
#Text=" Raiko says : " Right now , I need you to put aside your differences .
#Text=If Kuvira really is creating a super weapon , we 're going to need the two brightest minds in the city working together to stop it .
#Text=" Varrick says : " What do you say , Asami ?
#Text=But do n't even think about double - crossing me again .
